title: SROI framework & PwC TIMM: a comparison study
abstract: With sustainability issues becoming more relevant for todayâ€™s business, the accounting profession has come up with numerous tools to measure and report the sustainability impact generated from the business activities. This research paper aims to discuss two social-environmental accounting tools namely SROI Framework & PwC TIMM and how can these tools be measured and applied in a business specifically businesses that deal with food as their day-to-day activities. The analysis of this study was conducted using a literature review using both reports and journals. The result of this study discusses the key differences of the tools, advantages, and disadvantages, and more importantly, in what circumstances that the tools are preferred.
